page.title: 17LEISURE-CHILDREN'S
page.content: {GUIDES AND BROWNIES} These societies are for girls aged 7-10yrs (Brownies) and 10yrs onwards (Guides). Girls from Skidby (3km) and Newbald (7km) come to the Little Weighton society. The leader of the Brownies as Brown Owl. The Brownies have a law which says they must think of others before themselves and do a good turn every day. {CUBS AND SCOUTS} These activities are for boys. Cubs, like Brownies and Guides, meet weekly in the school, but sometimes go out for swimming or camping. Scouts may do canoeing and windsurfing as well. { {YOUTH CLUB}11yrs+, village hall,Friday { {GIRLS' FRIENDLY SOCIETY}V.hall,Tuesday { {PLAYGROUP}V.hall,to 5yrs, Mon,Wed,Fri.
